onboarding.descriptionLine1: We will find hidden local spots around you.
onboarding.descriptionLine2: Let me solve today's meal decision.
onboarding.privacy: Location data is used only for recommendations.
onboarding.errorNoGeolocation: This browser does not support geolocation.
onboarding.errorPermission: Allow location permission to get nearby recommendations.
onboarding.errorManualTooShort: Enter an address, city, or coordinates.
onboarding.errorMissingApi: Google Maps API key is missing, so manual text search is unavailable.
onboarding.errorNotFound: Location not found. Try a different query.
onboarding.errorSearchFailed: Location search failed. Please try again.

locationPicker.hint: Click the map or drag the pin to choose a location.

preferences.title: When are you eating?
preferences.subtitle: Pick the best spot that matches your mood today.

meal.dinnerDesc: A comforting finish to your day

results.mapHintKakao: Shown with Kakao Map in Korea. M: search origin ¬∑ Orange pins: recommendations
results.mapHintOsm: M: search origin ¬∑ 1-3: recommended spots. Drag and zoom to explore nearby.
results.mapLoadFailedFallback: Failed to load Kakao Map. Falling back to OSM.

editor.mapPickEmpty: Search first or use current location to set a base point.

error.queryTooShort: Enter an address, city, or coordinates.
error.missingApi: Google Maps API key is missing, so text search is limited.
error.notFound: Location not found. Try another keyword.
error.searchFailed: Location search failed. Please try again.
error.geolocationUnsupported: This browser does not support geolocation.
error.geolocationFailed: Could not get current location. Check permissions.
error.locationPreviewRequired: Pick a location on the map or from search first.

need_location.title: Location permission is required
need_location.body: Allow location permission to get nearby recommendations.

unsupported.title: Service not available yet
unsupported.body: This region is not supported right now. Try changing your country and retry.

empty.title: No restaurants found in this radius.
empty.body: No spots were found within your current filters. Increase radius or change location.

error.title: Connection looks unstable
error.body: Check your network and try again.

status.help2: If 500m returns few places, try 1km or 3km.
status.help3: Explorer mode surfaces more hidden local spots.
